HEy! 4 MORE DAYS UNTIL D.C.~! ahhhHH im so excited! Im really bored right now...yesterday night I went to Lindsy's Competition for her singing... she did a GREAT job she got 3rd place! i was so proud of her! and then we went to SPOONS and i met this really cute waiter...AND THEN...i went back to Lindsy's house and i ended up spending the night over there, and when we woke up i made the kids pancakes! mmmmm mmmmm goooood! ((damn im a good cook)) and then i came home...and then zady took me to the AT&T store...my dumb fone broke, so im gettin a new fone fo sho, but i MIGHT get a flip fone! *SO HAPPY* my fone was ghetto! ...haha and now im waiting for my mom...hopfully she'll take me shopping today! I'm SOOOOOO damn boRED! ugh...well anyways im oUTie! call the cell! ((it still works, but it just looks a lil beat up)) ;o)
*HeArTbRoKeN* Seriously why did it have to end like this... Lying wasn't kool I was nothing but nice to you What Happened? Just be a man and call me and tell me PLEASE! _OUT_

Hola Amigos!...I am soooooooo tired....::::YaWn:::: I went to bed pretty early, i think i was like 11:00pm and woke up at around 10:00am...*hehe*...so i go downstairs to see if zady came home, NOPE he didnt, and i knew he went to a party last night and he probably got a wEeEeEeE bit drunk...and obviously didnt come home because he was drinking so he spends the night at joes house...i called him at around 10:45 this morning and he answers i think i woke him up...can you say ((HANG OVER)) lol and he makes it even more obvious because when he usually spends the night at friends houses he comes home early like 8:00 early...but not this time..eH anyways as long as hes okay!!!!!! I'm bored already and the day has just begun! i feel like going shopping but im to lazy to get dressed for that, i woke up an hour ago and im not dressed yet...pittiful man well call me up 6.8.6.0.4.7.8! im outie bye ya'll

Hey...So yesterday was a pretty bad day, Skool was gay as always, then Mireya Olivia and I went to the SHHS baseball game...we didn't watch much of that because they suck so we went to watch swimmers((DAMN)) LOL, then i went home, ate dinner with the famila and then went to beccas because Lizzi's here! YAY!...it wasn't fun...i was really fed up with fredrick,Malcolm and Caleb, they really bug me...Then Drew said some mean stuff to olivia and she started crying and i was with her the rest of the night...Olivia and I are going thru the same stuff w/ guys! UGH its hell i swear...Then when my brother zady picked me up it was about 10:10pm..and we watched the good 'ol Television...and today i woke up at around 10am and took a shower and went for a jog with my doggy, yea yea i know i did things opposite i took a shower then went to sweat then took another one...i tend to do that sometime, you'll just have to forgive me... :op...I have no idea what i'm doing today...so how bout you guys call me up 6.8.6.0.4.7.8....that's my cellie...leave me a really nice message saying how much you luv me...Well I'm Outie! LUV YA'LL

So yesterday I found out the most devistating news of my life...my bestest friend Alejandro got into an accident...I love him so damn much I didn't know what to think, I didn't know if was okay, If he was going to be there by my side when we graduate Jr. High and High School. I didn't know what to do...Just imagining life with out him was the worst thing I have ever thought in my life...its been two days only and school, LIFE just isn't the same...Yea hearing his voice over the phone and knowing he's really Okay just puts me at eeze... God wanted us to really realize how much we need You Alejandro, and how we CAN'T live without you you're a big part of my life and of other peoples lives I know you will cherish like 10 times more than you did. And i know you'll charish All Of Your Loved Ones. I Love You Alejandro

All For You Nothing I say wil convince you that I love you For some reason you don’t believe me. You don’t want to believe my feeling for you Why? Is it because you’re not sure you can return my love Or is it because you simply don’t feel that way about me Can it be that you’re afraid of love Is it to you like a maples journey? Let me be your map Your compass Let me be your guide, your love Let me be yours Or let me know why it can not be Id get on my knees and beg for you to love me I’d kill for a chance to win your love To be the object of your deepest affection I’d die for you I’d give blood and precious life for you I’d conquer my fears and yours for you All this just to convince you that I love you. -Ilyana Ari ...wow i never know a single person could crush me like this. or anyone for that matter, If your that person and your reading this...Break out of your shell...be honest be YOU! I Gotta Jet

Hey guys...sry i havent blogged in a while...tryin to keep wup the grades! sucks dude! anyways Lindsy stayed at my house until today! it was pretty fun for the most part and today and yesterday i went to the TRACK MEET it was pretty fun and of course PARKS won...again..lol hahah it was so funny! i was sitting on the step and michelle was next to me and i just randomly yelled "HEY HOTTIE!" really loud to see what concieted mo-fo would look back and of course it was ALI! that whore-ish scrub that thinks shes all that, but really shes just a fat a$$ slut...anyways shes like "oh dont flatter me like that please" and i was like "dont worry im not" and she gave me the dirtiest look ever possible...it was quite funny actually and annie was freaked out. like ali is going to do something to me...haha funny monkeys! anyways i have a crap-ola worth of HMWK ...so -gotta jet- luv y'all

Hey...well i had a fun-filled weekend... FRIDAY: i went to TOYS "R" US to get Greg my fiance his birthday gift...LOL and then i went back home and i spent time with my parents because they were getting ready to go to Las Vegas for the weekend...then at like 5:30 Lindsy came and picked me up and we went back to her house and her parents went out to dinner and shopping at COSTCO! so Lindsy and i were home alone with gracie and greg...and we ordered pizza and then sean and jared came over and we went to the SUNSET LANE PARK...it was fun, i SOOOOOO won on the swings and then travis steve and marcus show up...and then every one was being dumb in a way...pressuring sean and crap but what ever...and then at like 8ish lindsy and i and the kids went back home and travis calls me up and hes like can you sneak out...you have to come back to the park...so lindsy and i said i "forgot" my fone at the park...so we get there and yea...LOL SATURDAY: TRAVis woke me up cuz he called my cell fone...and i had a missed call and a voice message and it was steve and hes like "im a tiger" it was really funny actually but anyways it was like 8:40 when i woke up and i had soccer tryouts at 9...i jumped out of bed and got dressed and yea..so i went to soccer tryouts it was quite fun actually...and then i came back home and took a shower and got ready and went to lindsy house for gregs party...(we got married that day) (sry sean) lol anyway...and we had plans to go to the movies and sean bailed (BUM) oh by the way ENVY is a really bad movie...not funny at all...then i went back to lindsys house and spent the night there again and all night till like 12 i was texting w/ sean lol...then i, ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ! SUNDAY: GOT ready to go to church with the Davis's, it was very enjoyable...and now im home and im typing this ...on mothers day...oh yea HAPPY MOMMY'S DAY ...my mommy isnt here ...shes in vegas...lol well im out luv y'all -GOTTA JET-

***HOOBASTANK*** ***The Reason*** i'm not a perfect person. there are many things i wish i didnt do but i continue learning. i never meant to do those things to you. and so i have to say before i go, that i just want you to know i've found a reason for me, to change who i used to be a reason to start over new, and the reason is you i'm sorry that i hurt, its something i must live with everyday and all the pain i put you through, i wish that i could take it all away and be the one who catches all your tears, thats why i need you to hear i'm not a perfect person, i never meant to do those things to you and so i have to say before i go that i just want you to know i've found a reason for me, to change who i used to be a reason to start over new, and the reason is you i've found a reason to show a side of me you didnt know a reason for all that i do, and the reason is you

Hey guys! Omg.
